item.title: To Shiny or Not to Shiny
item.description: That is the question… Shiny is one of my favorite R packages. For those who aren’t R enthusiasts (or those who are but haven’t yet been introduced to Shiny), Shiny is an R package that allows you to create interactive applications. With a single script, you can super easily create a UI and server that will take user input and generate graphs, tables, text, and even maps. So far, I’ve mostly used Shiny to level up my leaflet game.
